name: Adventures in Tanoshii
description:
In an alternate universe of a webcomic of the same name by me on ComicFury, a thirteen-year-old girl named Sarah Ryuuno has been dreaming of a world different from ours her entire life. One day, after she dreamed of her parents, they told her a secret that they hid from her for so long. They say it is for her own good, but why?

This game will be loosely based on my webcomic, especially with the 4 endings I will give it.

Features:

It's a Ren'py game, so there are quite a few features like saving, loading, going back and forth, joystick mapping, that sort of stuff.

Four endings and slight behind-the-scenes info about the story and progression.
